headline: From Apple to GM, Tariffs to Cost Companies Tens of Billions
summary: (Bloomberg) -- From Apple Inc. to General Motors Co., corporate America is bracing for tens of billions of dollars in damages from Trump’s trade war — and that’s before most affected goods have landed.Most Read from BloombergIs Trump’s Plan to Reopen the Notorious Alcatraz Prison Realistic?As Trump Reshapes Housing Policy, Renters Face Rollback of RightsVail to Borrow Muni Debt to Ease Ski Resort Town Housing CrunchNYC Warns of 17% Drop in Foreign Tourists Due to Trump PoliciesLA Mayor Credits T

headline: GE Vernova: What's Energizing This General Electric Spinoff? Eye-Popping Growth For Starters
summary: As GE HealthCare struggles and GE Aerospace takes flight, fellow spin-off GE Vernova looks to energize a sustainable breakout.
